descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Step into the quirky world of Tales of Snails, a tabletop VR adventure set in the shadows of America’s Prohibition era. Hidden beneath the city, an old cellar becomes your stage as you guide a determined snail through a series of time-pressured challenges. Every level is packed with tricky obstacles, clever traps, and a race against the clock as you fight to bring your snail to the rescue.

Blending the charm of a classic board game with the immersion of VR, Tales of Snails offers a unique mix of strategy, reflex, and atmosphere. The prohibition-themed setting adds a layer of mystery and style, with moody underground environments and a playful twist on survival.

Whether you’re chasing the fastest time, exploring every hidden corner, or simply enjoying the unlikely heroism of a snail, this game invites you to think fast, move carefully, and discover how slow can still win the race.

Features:

🐌 Tabletop VR adventure – Guide your snail hero through a miniature underground world.

⏱ Race against time – Beat the clock as you overcome tricky obstacles and traps.

🍸 Prohibition-era cellar – Explore moody, atmospheric environments inspired by the 1920s.

🎲 Board game feel in VR – A unique mix of puzzle strategy and immersive action.

🏆 Replay & master – Challenge yourself to rescue faster, smarter, and with style.
